# Credentials format

## Algorithmia

File: `algorithmia.json`

```
{
  "apiKey": "sim8As72h56j3mBYqEOSHfLE4k81"
}
```

## Watson-nlu
File: `watson-nlu.json`  

```
{
  "apikey": "vOFV4GcaCVDFuTh6fRwP91IdSTEd2362ZU59QkteNo9z",
  "iam_apikey_description": "Auto generated apikey during resource-key operation for Instance - crn:v1:bluemix:public:natural-language-understanding:us-south:a/4b863888ad4e441787c25b32d725ea83:b3f4441f-e72c-4bca-b1bb-69675943c469::",
  "iam_apikey_name": "auto-generated-apikey-4798b4d3-5576-4074-be1f-aef069d54847",
  "iam_role_crn": "crn:v1:bluemix:public:iam::::serviceRole:Manager",
  "iam_serviceid_crn": "crn:v1:bluemix:public:iam-identity::a/4b863888ad4e441787c25b32d725ea83::serviceid:ServiceId-705e0231-273c-4142-888f-4369b3666f40",
  "url": "https://gateway.watsonplatform.net/natural-language-understanding/api"
}
```
